title: Text Reuse Passage
description: Represents a passage of text that was identified as a part of a text reuse cluster

uid.description: Unique ID of the text reuse passage.

contentItemId.description: ID of the content item that the text reuse passage belongs to.

offset.description: Start and end offsets of the passage in the content item.

start.description: Start offset of the passage in the content item.

end.description: End offset of the passage in the content item.
